content:
```plantuml
@startuml "River Search and Rescue Sequence Diagram"

participant "Drone Commander" as Drone_Commander
participant "Semi-autonomous UAV" as Semi_autonomous_UAV
participant "Emergency Responders" as Emergency_Responders
participant "DroneResponse Commander" as DroneResponse_Commander
participant "Human Operator" as Human_Operator
participant "Mobile Rescue System" as Mobile_Rescue_System
participant "Back-up Operator" as Back_up_Operator
participant "Human Responders" as Human_Responders

Drone_Commander -> Semi_autonomous_UAV: Place UAVs in launch positions
Semi_autonomous_UAV -> Semi_autonomous_UAV: Activate and arm UAVs
Emergency_Responders -> Semi_autonomous_UAV: Generate flight routes
DroneResponse_Commander -> Semi_autonomous_UAV: Start mission
Semi_autonomous_UAV -> Semi_autonomous_UAV: Perform synchronized takeoff
Semi_autonomous_UAV -> Semi_autonomous_UAV: Fly assigned routes
Semi_autonomous_UAV -> Semi_autonomous_UAV: Capture and analyze images
Semi_autonomous_UAV -> DroneResponse_Commander: Raise victim_detection event
DroneResponse_Commander -> All "UIs" Registered: Forward victim_detection alert
Semi_autonomous_UAV -> Semi_autonomous_UAV: Switch to tracking mode if required
DroneResponse_Commander -> Human Operator: Request victim confirmation
Human Operator -> Semi_autonomous_UAV: Confirm victim sighting
DroneResponse_Commander -> Mobile_Rescue_System: Send GPS coordinates
Semi_autonomous_UAV -> Semi_autonomous_UAV: Deliver flotation device if needed
Human_Responders -> Semi_autonomous_UAV: Arrive at scene
Drone_Commander -> Semi_autonomous_UAV: End mission
Back_up_Operator -> Semi_autonomous_UAV: Review imagery
Back_up_Operator -> Semi_autonomous_UAV: Confirm not a victim
Semi_autonomous_UAV -> Semi_autonomous_UAV: Resume previous activity if not a victim
Semi_autonomous_UAV -> Semi_autonomous_UAV: Continue search if automatic tracking not permitted
Human Operator -> Semi_autonomous_UAV: Confirm victim sighting and track if required

@enduml
```

data.title: Provide surveillance and information about a traffic accident

content:
@startuml
title "Provide Surveillance and Information about a Traffic Accident"
participant "911 Call Operator"
participant "DroneResponse Commander" as DRC
participant "UAVs" as UAV
participant "Firefighters" as FF
participant "Police" as P
participant "Medical Crews" as MC
911CallOperator -> DRC: An accident report is received
DRC -> UAV: Plan route and obtain flight authorization
DRC -> UAV: Issue start mission command
UAV -> UAV: Perform synchronized takeoff
UAV -> UAV: Lease airspace and fly to accident location
UAV -> UAV: Capture and analyze images, stream video
UAV --> DRC: Send precise GPS coordinates
DRC -> UAV: Generate route for emergency responders
UAV -> UAV: Capture details of scene
UAV --> FF: Send accident structure information
UAV --|> P: Send traffic information
UAV --|> MC: Send human-related information
EmergencyResponders -> UAV: Arrive at scene
DRC --> UAV: End mission
@enduml

@startuml
title "Structural Fire Fighting"

Actor "Drone Commander"
Actor "Semi-autonomous UAV"

DroneCommander -> Semi-autonomousUAV: Activate fire support mission

DroneCommander -> Semi-autonomousUAV: Request flight authorization
Semi-autonomousUAV --> DroneCommander: Authorization granted

Semi-autonomousUAV -> Semi-autonomousUAV: Activate and arm
Semi-autonomousUAV --> Semi-autonomousUAV: Perform synchronized takeoff
Semi-autonomousUAV -> Semi-autonomousUAV: Create initial mapping of building
Semi-autonomousUAV -> Semi-autonomousUAV: Plan surveillance flights

loop for each surveillance leg
    Semi-autonomousUAV -> Semi-autonomousUAV: Lease necessary airspace
    Semi-autonomousUAV -> Semi-autonomousUAV: Perform image capture and analysis
end

Semi-autonomousUAV -> Semi-autonomousUAV: Stream and aggregate imagery

Semi-autonomousUAV --> numOf Uavs:return to launch

Semi-autonomousUAV -> StarWidget:view sequencesmonitor3Ax88F
success(end): Fire controlled

==> ErrorResponse: possible victim detected
activate ErrorResponse
ErrorResponse -> Semi-autonomousUAV: raise alert for victim confirmation

Semi-autonomousUAV --> Semi-autonomousUAV: stream imagery

Semi-autonomousUAV -> RescueMission: execute rescue
deactive ErrorResponse  

@enduml

```plantuml
@startuml
title "Active Tracking Use Case"

actor "Semi-Autonomous UAV" as UA
actor "Mission Commander" as MC

UA -> UA: "Position itself in tracking position" 
UA -> UA: "Capture and tag victim in image stream"
UA -> UA: "Calculate relative position"
UA -> UA: "Generate velocity vectors"
UA -> UA: "Send velocity vector to autopilot and execute"

note right: "Steps 2-5 are repeated until stop tracking command"

error UA
MC --> UA: "UAV loses track of victim"
UA -> UA: "Attempt to re-tag victim"

@enduml
```

data.title: Generate Flight Routes for Area Coverage

content:
```plantuml
@startuml
title Generate Flight Routes for Area Coverage

actor "Drone Commander" as DC
actor "Semi-autonomous UAV" as UAV
participant "User" as U
participant "DroneResponse" as DR

U -> DR: Selects feature to mark region
U -> DR: Marks polygon shape
DR -> DR: Analyzes polygon shape
U -> DR: Specifies number of UAVs (N)
DR -> DR: Generates efficient set of N flight routes
DR -> DR: Assigns flight routes
:Use case ends

alt Optimization for Sampling Mission
    DR -> DR: Optimizes flight paths for sampling mission
    U -> DR: Specifies number of samples (S)
    DR -> DR: Distributes sampling locations evenly
    DR -> DR: Clusters locations into N flight paths
    DR -> DR: Optimizes each UAV's flight path 
    else Optimization for Area Coverage
    DR -> DR: Optimizes flight paths for area coverage
end

@enduml
```

@startuml
title End Mission

participant "Drone Commander" as DroneCommander
participant "Semi-autonomous UAV" as SemiAutonomousUAV
participant System

DroneCommander -> System: End Mission command
note right of System
1. The mission is completed\nand UAVs are recalled home.
2. The system checks that all\nrecalled UAVs have unique home\ncoordinates.
3. UAVs each plan their own\nroutes back to their unique home\ncoordinates.
4. Each UAV leases airspace for\nthe next leg of its planned route\nand awaits clearance.
5. Upon receiving clearance, the\nUAV flies to the target waypoint.
6. Steps 4-5 are repeated until\nthe UAV returns to its launch\ncoordinates and lands safely.
end note
System -> SemiAutonomousUAV: Return to base

alt Mission Commander decision
    SemiAutonomousUAV --> System: Task completion request
else New task assigned
    System --> SemiAutonomousUAV: Assign new task
    Note right of System
    Cancel END_MISSION command
    UAV commences new mission
    end note
end

faultelse Multiple UAVs with same home cords
    System -> System: Assign unique home cords
end

@enduml

```plantuml
@startuml "Image Capture and Analysis Sequence Diagram"

Semi-Autonomous UAV -> Mission Commander: Receive command to collect and analyze imagery
Semi-Autonomous UAV -> Semi-Autonomous UAV: Activate camera if not activated
Semi-Autonomous UAV -> Semi-Autonomous UAV: Stream imagery to onboard computer
onboard vision model-> Semi-Autonomous UAV: Process streamed imagery
onboard vision model-> Semi-Autonomous UAV: Annotate objects of interest
Semi-Autonomous UAV -> Semi-Autonomous UAV: Detect objects with high confidence
Semi-Autonomous UAV -> Mission Commander: Raise detection event
Semi-Autonomous UAV -> Semi-Autonomous UAV: Transmit annotated image streams to videostream server
Semi-Autonomous UAV -> semi-Autonomous UAV: Repeat steps 2-5 until commanded to stop

@enduml
```

```plantuml
@startuml
title "Image Capture and Analysis"

actor "Semi-Autonomous UAV" as UAV
actor "Mission Commander" as Commander
actor "Onboard vision model" as VisionModel

UAV -> VisionModel: activate camera
UAV -> FHA: stream imagery
FHA -> VisionModel: process and annotate imagery
if object is detected
VisionModel -> DroneResponseEventManager: raise event
end if
UAV -> Widget: transmit images
if camera battery is depleted
UAV -> UAV: raise alert
UAV --> Commander: notification of battery depletion
end if

@enduml
```
